column4: Why are there two Actions schedulers listed in Services (anacron and atd) and two Computer Activity Loggers (klogd and sysklogd) and two Power Managements (acpid and apmd) ... can I disable one of each?
though i could remove at without breaking anything
ok .. I've always wondered if I had installed two sets back when I had temporarily installed KDE Desktop in addition to Gnome .. thanks
